item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所（CME）因交易活动增加而利润上升
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团周三公布的数据显示，第四季度利润实现增长，这得益于股票和金属产品需求强劲推动了交易量上升。【原文：Derivatives exchange CME Group posted a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, as strong demand for equity and metal products bolstered trading volumes.】

item.title: 《纽约时报》季度订阅收入增长超预期
item.description: 《纽约时报》周三预测其第一季度订阅收入将超出华尔街预期，预计其新闻与生活方式产品的捆绑策略将吸引更多付费用户。【原文：The New York Times forecast first-quarter subscription revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, expecting its bundling strategy for news and lifestyle products to draw in more paying users.】

item.title: 炼油商菲利普斯66公司季度利润超预期，得益于利润率回升
item.description: 炼油商菲利普斯66周三公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，此前美国炼油利润率在2024年持续低迷后出现反弹，推动公司盈利回升。【原文：Refiner Phillips 66 beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, as a rebound in U.S. refining margins lifted earnings after a prolonged slump in 2024.】

item.title: 德州仪器以75亿美元收购芯片设计公司Silicon Laboratories
item.description: 德州仪器周三宣布以75亿美元收购芯片设计公司Silicon Laboratories，此举将扩大其在工业和消费类应用领域无线连接芯片的市场份额。【原文：Texas Instruments on Wednesday agreed to buy chip designer Silicon Laboratories in a deal valued at $7.5 billion, expanding its footprint in wireless connectivity chips used for industrial and consumer applications.】

item.title: 肯德基母公司百胜餐饮集团同店销售额超预期，消费者趋向选择超值套餐
item.description: 百胜餐饮集团周三公布的第四季度同店销售额超出预期，主要得益于美国塔可贝尔门店平价餐品的强劲需求，以及肯德基国际业务的稳健表现。【原文：Yum Brands beat fourth-quarter comparable sales estimates on Wednesday, driven by strong demand for affordable meal options at Taco Bell stores in the U.S., as well as strength in its KFC international business.】

item.title: 优步盈利预测低于预期，因低价出行服务虽提升乘车次数却损害利润率
item.description: 优步科技周三公布的财报显示，其第一季度盈利低于市场预期，且未达第四季度预期目标。由于该公司通过推出更实惠的出行选项来提升订单量，导致利润率受到冲击。【原文：Uber Technologies forecast first-quarter profit below market expectations and missed fourth-quarter estimates on Wednesday, as margins took a toll from the company's attempt to lift trip volumes through more affordable ride options.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会发言人表示，TikTok在欧盟对罗马尼亚选举的调查中表现出高度配合
item.description: 欧盟委员会发言人托马斯·雷尼尔周三表示，社交媒体公司TikTok正"极度配合"欧盟委员会针对其可能干预2024年罗马尼亚选举的调查。【原文：Social media firm TikTok is "extremely cooperative" with the European Commission's ongoing investigation on potential interference in the 2024 Romanian elections, Commission spokesperson Thomas Regnier said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 礼来公司2026年利润将超预期，减肥药需求激增
item.description: 礼来公司周三预测2026年利润将超出华尔街预期，押注其减肥药需求激增。这家全球市值最高的制药企业正准备在今年晚些时候推出口服减肥药。【原文：Eli Lilly forecast 2026 profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on surging demand for its obesity drugs as the world's most valuable drugmaker prepares to launch its oral weight-loss pill later this year.】

item.title: GCL称马斯克代表团访问了该公司，中国官方媒体报道
item.description: 中国太阳能电池板制造商协鑫集团表示，由埃隆·马斯克率领的企业代表团于周三到访。中国官方媒体《证券时报》报道称。【原文：Chinese solar panel maker GCL Group said a delegation from companies led by Elon Musk visited on Wednesday, Chinese state media outlet Securities Times reported.】

item.title: 科睿唯安预测全年营收将超预期，得益于强劲的人工智能需求
item.description: 科睿唯安科技周三发布的年度营收预测超出华尔街预期，该公司押注企业将人工智能融入工作流程将推动其IT服务需求强劲增长。【原文：Cognizant Technology forecast annual revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on strong demand for its IT services as businesses adopt artificial intelligence into their workflows.】

item.title: 雷神公司赢得为美国建造数千枚导弹的合同，包括战斧导弹
item.description: 五角大楼正全力扩大军火生产规模，与此同时，华盛顿方面也在争分夺秒地重建已耗尽的军火储备。【原文：The Pentagon's push to expand production comes as Washington races to rebuild depleted stockpiles.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：人工智能搅动科技股行情
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 期货市场表现平淡，人工智能担忧冲击软件股；谷歌母公司Alphabet与ADP成为焦点
item.description: 周三美国股指期货走势平淡，投资者在前一交易日遭遇重挫后避开软件和云计算类股，而AMD在发布悲观预测后股价下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Wednesday as investors avoided software and cloud stocks following a bruising slide in the previous session, while AMD slid after issuing a dour forecast.】

item.title: 邦吉第四季度盈利超预期
item.description: 邦吉周三公布的第四季度经调整利润超出华尔街预期，这家谷物贸易商受益于其所有业务板块的强劲表现。【原文：Bunge beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter adjusted profit on Wednesday, as the grain trader benefited from strong performance across all its segments.】

item.title: 马斯克推动SpaceX与xAI的超级合并，押注太空数据中心的科幻未来
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克手握全球最繁忙的卫星发射舰队、一家人工智能初创公司，以及从地球延伸至太空的雄心勃勃的基础设施计划。【原文：Elon Musk is armed with the world's busiest satellite launch fleet, an AI startup, and an appetite for infrastructure that stretches from Earth to vacuum.】

item.title: 独家：美国参议员提出法案，旨在遏制社交媒体平台上的诈骗广告
item.description: 美国参议员鲁本·加列戈和伯尼·莫雷诺提出反诈骗法案，要求社交媒体平台对广告商进行审核。【原文：U.S. Senators Ruben Gallego and Bernie Moreno have introduced anti-scam legislation requiring social media platforms to vet their advertisers.】

item.title: 洞察：Shein试图将巴西打造成生产基地，但当地工厂纷纷撤离
item.description: 2023年，当Shein凭借时尚款式、低廉价格以及安妮塔等巨星代言席卷巴西市场之际，该公司大胆承诺将把巴西打造成整个拉丁美洲的制造中心。【原文：In 2023, as Shein was taking Brazil by storm with trendy styles, low prices, and endorsements from megastars like Anitta, the company made an audacious pledge to turn the country into a manufacturing hub for all of Latin America.】

item.title: 亚马逊加速实体杂货业务布局，加剧与沃尔玛的竞争
item.description: 亚马逊曾凭借革命性的电子商务业务，以新锐之姿领先沃尔玛。如今它却押注于那种通常与阿肯色州本顿维尔的竞争对手相联系的巨型商店。【原文：Amazon was once the upstart running ahead of Walmart with its revolutionary e-commerce business. It now finds itself betting on the kind of mega-store typically associated with its Bentonville, Arkansas, rival.】

item.title: 参议员推动700亿美元拨款协议以支持特朗普关键矿产计划，据《金融时报》报道
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，美国参议员将于周三提出立法，为美国进出口银行未来十年的运营重新授权资金。议员们试图向该机构注入额外700亿美元资金，以支持美国总统唐纳德·特朗普推动关键矿产战略的举措。【原文：Senators will introduce legislation on Wednesday to reauthorize funding for the United States Export-Import Bank for the next decade, as lawmakers try to inject an extra $70 billion into the agency to support U.S. President Donald Trump's critical minerals push, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 奇波特尔、亿滋国际股价下跌，需求疲软与成本上升拖累销售预期
item.description: 墨西哥卷饼连锁品牌Chipotle Mexican Grill的股价周三盘前暴跌6%，亿滋国际（Mondelez International）股价下跌4.5%。两家公司发布的年度销售预测黯淡，引发市场对消费者需求疲软及投入成本上升的担忧。【原文：Shares of burrito chain Chipotle Mexican Grill slumped 6% and Mondelez International fell 4.5% before the bell on Wednesday as dour annual sales forecasts from the companies raised worries over weak consumer demand and rising input costs.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行股价下跌，因拟以122亿美元收购韦伯斯特银行
item.description: 桑坦德银行股价周三一度下跌5%，此前该公司宣布拟以122亿美元收购韦伯斯特金融公司，而分析师们虽认可该交易的战略意义，却同时警示了短期执行风险。【原文：Santander shares fell as much as 5% on Wednesday after the announcement of its proposed $12.2 billion acquisition of Webster Financial and the flagging of short-term execution risks by analysts who otherwise welcomed the deal's strategic rationale.】

item.title: 恩智浦首席执行官称"物理人工智能"需求推动前景向好
item.description: 荷兰芯片制造商恩智浦半导体公司的新任首席执行官向路透社表示，随着企业将人工智能应用于物流自动化、工作场所安全和机器人技术等工业系统，该公司正受益于其所谓的"物理人工智能"。【原文：Dutch computer chip maker NXP Semiconductors is benefitting from what it calls "physical AI", as businesses apply artificial intelligence in industrial systems such as logistics automation, workplace safety and robotics, its new CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 全球软件股因Anthropic对人工智能颠覆性影响的警示而受挫
item.description: 深度抛售反映出市场对人工智能发展可能影响企业生存的担忧日益加剧。【原文：The deep selloff reflected growing concerns about how advances in artificial intelligence might impact companies' livelihoods.】

item.title: 深圳汉斯数控定价区间上限在香港上市，目标筹资6.18亿港元
item.description: 印刷电路板（PCB）设备制造商深圳汉斯数控科技周三表示，其香港上市定价将位于发行价区间的上限，计划募集资金总额达48.3亿港元（6.1815亿美元）。【原文：Printed circuit board (PCB) equipment maker Shenzhen Han's CNC Technology said on Wednesday it was set to price its Hong Kong listing at the top end of its offer range, aiming to raise a total of HK$4.83 billion ($618.15 million).】

item.title: 日经报道称丰田计划到2028年将混合动力车产量提升30%
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周三报道，丰田计划到2028年将混合动力和插电式混合动力汽车产量提升至约670万辆，较其2026年目标高出约30%。【原文：Toyota plans to boost production of hybrid and plug‑in hybrid vehicles to around 6.7 million units by 2028, about 30% higher than its target for 2026, the Nikkei business daily reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国慕源制药瞄准香港上市定价区间上限，拟募资14亿美元
item.description: 中国最大的生猪养殖企业牧元食品周三宣布，已确定以最高发行价在香港上市，计划通过此次股票发行筹集约106.9亿港元（13.7亿美元）。【原文：China's biggest pig breeder, Muyuan Foods said on Wednesday it has determined to price its Hong Kong listing at its maximum offer price, aiming to raise about HK$10.69 billion ($1.37 billion) from the share sale.】

item.title: 全球监管机构警示16万亿美元政府支持回购市场风险
item.description: 全球金融监管机构周三警告称，规模达16万亿美元的政府债券回购市场正积聚风险隐患，指出对冲基金杠杆率攀升且对短期融资的依赖日益加深。【原文：Vulnerabilities are building across the $16 trillion market for government bond-backed repurchase agreements, a global financial watchdog warned on Wednesday, highlighting rising leverage among hedge funds and growing dependence on short-term funding.】

item.title: 雀巢扩大法国婴幼儿配方奶粉召回范围，新增吉格兹新批次产品
item.description: 雀巢公司周三表示，在法国降低乳脂毒素的最高限值后，该公司扩大了婴儿配方奶粉的召回范围，新增一批吉格兹牌奶粉。【原文：Nestle widened an infant formula recall to include a new batch of Guigoz formula after France lowered the maximum cereulide toxin threshold, the Swiss group said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商推出长期融资计划以刺激需求
item.description: 中国汽车制造商正将客户还款期限延长至长达八年，以吸引消费者，尽管全球最大汽车市场的需求持续低迷。【原文：Automakers in China are extending repayment terms for customers to as long as eight years to woo consumers amid stagnant demand in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 特斯拉1月在华电动汽车销量同比增长9.3%
item.description: 特斯拉1月份在中国销售了69,129辆国产电动汽车，同比增长9.3%，连续第三个月实现增长。尽管这家电动汽车制造商在中国和欧洲市场都面临着市场份额萎缩的困境。【原文：Tesla sold 69,129 China-made electric vehicles in January, up 9.3% from a year-ago period, extending gains for a third consecutive month even as the electric vehicle maker battles shrinking market share in both China and Europe.】
